$comment: Amazon product type definition for HOME product type

item_name.title: Product Name
examples: KitchenAid KFP670 Professional Food Processor, White

value.title: Item Name
value.description: Provide a title for the item that may be customer facing

value.title: Brand Name
value.description: Provide the brand name of the product

externally_assigned_product_identifier.title: External Product ID
externally_assigned_product_identifier.description: Provide the external ID (barcode) type and corresponding value that is being used to identify the product

type.title: External Product ID Type
type.description: Select the type of external ID (barcode) that is being used to identify this product

value.title: External Product ID
value.description: Provide the corresponding external product id value based on the type that was selected

merchant_suggested_asin.title: Merchant Suggested ASIN
merchant_suggested_asin.description: Provide an ASIN for your product if one exists. If a value is not provided, the system will attempt a match based on the External Product ID.

value.title: Merchant Suggested ASIN
value.description: Provide an ASIN for your product if one exists. If a value is not provided, the system will attempt a match based on the External Product ID.

supplier_declared_has_product_identifier.title: Is exempt from a supplier declared external identifier
supplier_declared_has_product_identifier.description: Please specify if the product is exempt from supplier declared external product identifiers.

value.title: Is exempt from supplier declared external product identifier
value.description: Please specify if the product is exempt from supplier declared external product identifiers.

value.title: Recommended Browse Nodes
value.description: Indicate the browse node or section of the Amazon website where the product will be assigned. This allows customers to find the product on the website easily. If you don't provide a node or if you provide an incorrect node, customers may not be able to find your product.

age_gender_category.title: Age Gender Category
age_gender_category.description: Specify the department where the product should be found

value.title: Age Gender Category
value.description: Specify the department where the product should be found

model_number.title: Model Number
model_number.description: An alphanumeric string; 40 characters maximum in length.

value.title: Model Number
value.description: Provide the manufacturer 's model number for the item

model_name.title: Model Name
model_name.description: Specify the model name of the product as defined by the manufacturer or brand excluding item type, color, brand or size

value.title: Model Name
value.description: Specify the model name of the product as defined by the manufacturer or brand excluding item type, color, brand or size

value.title: Manufacturer
value.description: Provide the company that manufactures the product.

skip_offer.title: Skip Offer
skip_offer.description: Please indicate whether the offer should be skipped and a buyable offer should not be created. A value of "Yes", means no offer will be created.

value.title: Skip Offer
value.description: Please indicate whether the offer should be skipped and a buyable offer should not be created. A value of "Yes", means no offer will be created.

fulfillment_availability.title: Fulfillment Availability
fulfillment_availability.description: For those merchants using Amazon fulfillment services, please provide associated logistical information.

fulfillment_channel_code.title: Fulfillment Channel Code
fulfillment_channel_code.description: For those merchants using Amazon fulfillment services, this designates which fulfillment network will be used. Specifying a value other than DEFAULT will cancel the Merchant-fulfilled offering.

quantity.title: Quantity
quantity.description: Enter the quantity of the item you are making available for sale. This is your current inventory commitment (as a whole number)

lead_time_to_ship_max_days.title: Handling Time
lead_time_to_ship_max_days.description: Provide the time, in days, between when you receive an order for an item and when you can ship the item

restock_date.title: Restock Date
restock_date.description: Date that product will be restocked

is_inventory_available.title: Inventory Always Available
is_inventory_available.description: Always available inventory is an alternative to quantity that allows inventory to never deplete. Enabling or disabling will toggle this feature on or off. Note that a quantity cannot be specified when provided.

value.title: Minimum Advertised Price Display
value.description: Select one.

purchasable_offer.title: Purchasable Offer
purchasable_offer.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer of the product

map_price.title: Purchasable Offer Map Price
map_price.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Map Price of the product

schedule.title: Purchasable Offer Map Price Schedule
schedule.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Map Price Schedule of the product

our_price.title: Purchasable Offer Our Price
our_price.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Our Price of the product

schedule.title: Purchasable Offer Our Price Schedule
schedule.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Our Price Schedule of the product

value_with_tax.title: Your Price
value_with_tax.description: Provide base price of the item at which it is being offered to the intended buyer segment

minimum_seller_allowed_price.title: Purchasable Offer Minimum Seller Allowed Price
minimum_seller_allowed_price.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Minimum Seller Allowed Price of the product

schedule.title: Purchasable Offer Minimum Seller Allowed Price Schedule
schedule.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Minimum Seller Allowed Price Schedule of the product

value_with_tax.title: Minimum Seller Alllowed Price
value_with_tax.description: Provide the minimum seller allowed price

maximum_seller_allowed_price.title: Purchasable Offer Maximum Seller Allowed Price
maximum_seller_allowed_price.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Maximum Seller Allowed Price of the product

schedule.title: Purchasable Offer Maximum Seller Allowed Price Schedule
schedule.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Maximum Seller Allowed Price Schedule of the product

value_with_tax.title: Maximum Seller Allowed Price
value_with_tax.description: Provide the maximum seller allowed price

discounted_price.title: Purchasable Offer Discounted Price
discounted_price.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Discounted Price of the product

schedule.title: Purchasable Offer Discounted Price Schedule
schedule.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Discounted Price Schedule of the product

value_with_tax.title: Sale Price
value_with_tax.description: The price at which you offer the product for sale.

start_at.title: Sale Start Date
start_at.description: The date that the sale price will begin to override the product's standard price; the sale price will be displayed after 0:00AM of Sale From Date.

end_at.title: Sale End Date
end_at.description: The last date that the sale price will override the item's standard price; the product's standard price will be displayed after 0:00AM of Sale End Date.

start_at.title: Purchasable Offer Start At
start_at.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer Start At of the product

value.title: Offering Release Date
value.description: Your price start date

end_at.title: Purchasable Offer End At
end_at.description: The attribute indicates the Purchasable Offer End At of the product

value.title: Stop Selling Date
value.description: Your price end date

audience.title: Audience
audience.description: Provide the intended buyer segment or program that this purchasable offer is applicable to.

quantity_discount_plan.title: Purchasable Business Offer Quantity Discount Plan
quantity_discount_plan.description: Provide and define the quantity discount plan for your business price.
examples: Schedule Quantity Price Type: Fixed; Schedule Levels Quantity Lower Bound: 5; Schedule Levels Quantity Price: 10

schedule.title: Schedule
schedule.description: Provide the details, such as dates, pricing type that define your scheduled quantity discount plan.
examples: Quantity price start date: 06/30/2024; Quantity price end date: 07/01/2024

discount_type.title: Quantity Price Type
discount_type.description: Provide whether the quantity price type is fixed, a price set in local currency for each quantity threshold, or a percentage of business price

lower_bound.title: Quantity Threshold (Lower Bound)
lower_bound.description: Provide the minimum purchase quantity necessary to receive the discount. It will apply to all units if the quantity threshold is met.

value.title: Quantity Price (Fixed Price/Percentage Discount)
value.description: Provide the quantity price for each quantity threshold or the discount percentage offered on the business price for each quantity threshold.

condition_type.title: Offering Condition Type
condition_type.description: Provide the actual condition type of the product

value.title: Offering Condition Type
value.description: Provide the actual condition type of the product

condition_note.title: Offer Condition Note
condition_note.description: Provide descriptive text explaining the actual condition of the item

value.title: Offer Condition Note
value.description: Provide descriptive text explaining the actual condition of the item
examples: Small dent in left side panel.

list_price.title: List Price
list_price.description: Provide the list price for the product. List Price is the suggested retail price of a product as provided by a manufacturer, supplier, or seller. This is not the offering or cost price.

value.title: List Price
value.description: Provide the list price for the product not including tax. List Price is the suggested retail price of a product as provided by a manufacturer, supplier, or seller. This is not the offering or cost price. If you are unable to provide a value, enter 0.

product_tax_code.title: Product Tax Code
product_tax_code.description: Enter the product tax code supplied to you by Amazon.com

value.title: Product Tax Code
value.description: Enter the product tax code supplied to you by Amazon.com

merchant_release_date.title: Offering Release Date
merchant_release_date.description: Provide the merchant release date using YYYY-MM-DD format

value.title: Merchant Release Date
value.description: Provide the merchant release date using YYYY-MM-DD format

merchant_shipping_group.title: Merchant Shipping Group
merchant_shipping_group.description: The ship configuration group for an offer. The ship configuration group is created and managed by the seller through the ship setting UI.

value.title: Merchant Shipping Group
value.description: The ship configuration group for an offer. The ship configuration group is created and managed by the seller through the ship setting UI.
examples: Heavy Bulky Products, NCR Large Appliance Delivery

value.title: Maximum Order Quantity
value.description: Max order quantity.

can_be_messaged.title: Offering Can Be Gift Messaged
can_be_messaged.description: If you can print a gift message with the item indicate that here.  If left blank, defaults to 'false'

can_be_wrapped.title: Is Gift Wrap Available
can_be_wrapped.description: If you can gift wrap an item indicate that here.  If left blank, defaults to 'false'

main_offer_image_locator.title: Main Offer Image Locator
main_offer_image_locator.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Main Image Location
media_location.description: The URL where the main offer-specific image of the product is located

other_offer_image_locator_1.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_1.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_2.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_2.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_3.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_3.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_4.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_4.description: Provide the location of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

other_offer_image_locator_5.title: Other Offer Image Locator
other_offer_image_locator_5.description: Provide the location and source of the image

media_location.title: Other Image Location
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

handmade_classification.title: Handmade Classification
handmade_classification.description: Select the value that best describes how the product was produced

value.title: Handmade Classification
value.description: Select the value that best describes how the product was produced

product_description.title: Description
product_description.description: A text string; 2000 characters maximum in length. Note: Type 1 High ASCII characters (®, ©, ™, etc.) or other special characters are not supported.
examples: 8-Piece luxury comforter set product includes 1 comforter, 1 bed skirt, 2 shams, 2 euro shams, and 2 decorated pillows.

value.title: Product Description
value.description: Provide a text description of the product. This information will appear in paragraph form on the detail page of your product. Include unique product features, product line details, and product specifications. Do not use all caps.
examples: This summer, boots by Jette made from high quality suede leather are real gems. They visually highlight the craftsmanship and fine leather braid positioned at the top of the shaft

bullet_point.title: BulletPoint
bullet_point.description: An alphanumeric string; 500 characters maximum length per bullet point. Please do not include an actual bullet point object, just the text used to describe your product.  Note: Type 1 High ASCII characters (®, ©, ™, etc.) or other special characters are not supported.

value.title: Bullet Point
value.description: Brief descriptive text, called out via a bullet point, regarding a specific aspect of the product. These display directly under or next to your product photo, it is useful to put interesting information in these fields. Do NOT use all caps or abbreviations. Please do NOT use for fabric content, care instructions or country as these are populated in different fields.

generic_keyword.title: SearchTerm
generic_keyword.description:
A text string; 50 characters maximum in length.

This is in addition to the valid values that you must submit for your product.

value.title: Generic Keyword
value.description: Provide any terms that may be relevant to customer searches. No repetition, no competitor brand names or ASINs.
examples: Water sport shoes; Derek Rose; Electric; Wi-Fi; Banana

value.title: Style
value.description: Provide the style of the product. Style refers to the aesthetic choices of a person or a group of people. It describes the distinctive visual representation of a product

age_range_description.title: Age Range Description
age_range_description.description: Specify an appropriate age range description for the item

value.title: Age Range Description
value.description: Specify an appropriate age range description for the item

value.title: Material
value.description: Specify the primary materials used for manufacturing the item

number_of_items.title: Number of Items
number_of_items.description: Provide the total number of identical items in the selling unit to the customer

value.title: Number of Items
value.description: Provide the total number of identical items in the selling unit to the customer

value.title: Item Package Quantity
value.description: Provide the number of packages sold as part of a single item. An ASIN selling 5 boxes of paperclips with 100 paperclips per box would have item package quantity = '5'

deprecated_shaft_style_type.title: Shaft Style Type
deprecated_shaft_style_type.description: The attribute indicates the Deprecated Shaft Style Type of the product

value.title: Shaft Style
value.description: The attribute indicates the Deprecated Shaft Style Type of the product

color.title: Colour
color.description: Provide the color of the product

value.title: Color
value.description: Provide the color of the product

size.title: Size
size.description: An alphanumeric text string; 1 character minimum and 50 characters maximum. Also See Valid Values.

value.title: Size
value.description: Provide the size of the item

item_length_description.title: Item Length Description
item_length_description.description: Provide a textual description of the item's length. Length typically refers to the longer or vertical dimension of an item.

value.title: Item Length Description
value.description: Provide a textual description of the item's length. Length typically refers to the longer or vertical dimension of an item.

metal_type.title: Metal Type
metal_type.description: Provide the type of metal on the item.

value.title: Metal Type
value.description: Provide the type of metal on the item.

value.title: Part Number
value.description: Provide the part number. For many products, this will be identical to the model number however some manufacturers distinguish part number from model number

value.title: Item Shape
value.description: Specify the shape of the item

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Provide the primary high-level subject, concept, topic, motif, or idea of an item.

value.title: Theme
value.description: Provide the primary high-level subject, concept, topic, motif, or idea of an item.

ring.title: Ring
ring.description: The attribute indicates Ring of the product

size.title: Ring Size
size.description: Provide the size of the ring

value.title: Ring Size
value.description: Provide the size of the ring

frame.title: Frame
frame.description: The attribute indicates the Frame of the product

material.title: Frame Material
material.description: Specify the material of the item's frame

value.title: Frame Material
value.description: Specify the material of the item's frame

shaft.title: Shaft
shaft.description: The attribute indicates Shaft of the product

value.title: Shaft Material
value.description: Provide the appropriate shaft material

value.title: Collection Description
value.description: Collection Description

edition.title: Edition
edition.description: Provide the version or edition of the item

value.title: Edition
value.description: Provide the version or edition of the item

configuration.title: Load Configuration
configuration.description: Use this to note the configuration of the luggage or backpack

value.title: Configuration
value.description: Indicate the configuration of the item

paper_size.title: Paper Size
paper_size.description: Specify the size of the paper

value.title: Paper Size
value.description: Specify the size of the paper as a numeric value

unit.title: Paper Size Unit
unit.description: Select the corresponding unit

line_size.title: Line Size
line_size.description: Provide the product's line or point size

value.title: Line Size
value.description: Provide the product's line or point size

unit.title: Line Size Unit
unit.description: Provide a unit of measure for the product's line or point size

design_name.title: Design Name
design_name.description: Select a value that best describes the design on the product

value.title: Design Name
value.description: Select a value that best describes the design on the product

value.title: Capacity
value.description: Provide the capacity of the item as a numeric value

unit.title: Capacity Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Capacity. If a value is provided for Capacity, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

support_type.title: Support Type
support_type.description: The attribute indicates the Support Type of the product

value.title: Support Type
value.description: The attribute indicates the Support Type of the product

number_of_hooks.title: Number of Hooks
number_of_hooks.description: Provide the number of hooks the item has

value.title: Number of Hooks
value.description: Provide the number of hooks the item has

item_display_dimensions.title: Item Display Dimensions
item_display_dimensions.description: Provide the dimensions of the product, without packaging and fully assembled

depth.title: Item Display Depth
depth.description: Provide the depth of the item without packaging

value.title: Item Display Depth
value.description: Provide the numeric component of the physical depth of the product without packaging and fully assembled

unit.title: Item Display Depth Unit
unit.description: Select the corresponding unit

diameter.title: Item Display Diameter
diameter.description: Provide the diameter of the product without packaging and fully assembled

value.title: Item Display Diameter
value.description: Provide the numeric component of the diameter of the product without packaging and fully assembled

unit.title: Item Display Diameter Unit
unit.description: Select the corresponding unit

height.title: Item Display Height
height.description: Provide the height of the product without packaging and fully assembled

value.title: Item Display Height
value.description: Provide the numeric component of the height of the product without packaging and fully assembled

unit.title: Item Display Height Unit
unit.description: Select the corresponding unit

length.title: Item Display Length
length.description: Provide the length of the product without packaging and fully assembled

value.title: Item Display Length
value.description: Provide the numeric component of the length of the product without packaging and fully assembled

unit.title: Item Display Length Unit
unit.description: Select the corresponding unit

width.title: Item Display Width
width.description: Provide the width of the product without packaging and fully assembled

value.title: Item Display Width
value.description: Provide the numeric component of the width of the product without packaging and fully assembled

unit.title: Item Display Width Unit
unit.description: Select the corresponding unit

occasion.title: Occasion
occasion.description: Indicate the occasion of use for the product

value.title: Occasion
value.description: Indicate the occasion of use for the product

flavor.title: Flavor
examples: Double Rich Chocolate, Cherry, Chocolate, Vanilla

value.title: Flavor
value.description: Specify the flavor of the product
examples: Double Rich Chocolate, Cherry, Chocolate, Vanilla

value.title: Wattage
value.description: Provide the wattage rating as a numeric value

unit.title: Wattage Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Wattage. If a value is provided for Wattage, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

voltage.title: voltage
voltage.description: A positive whole number. Please do not include the word "volts."

value.title: Voltage
value.description: Provide the voltage value as a numeric value

unit.title: Voltage Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Voltage. If a value is provided for Voltage, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

operating_system.title: Operating System
operating_system.description: Provide the operating system software installed on the item that manages hardware, software resources, andProvides common services for computer programs.

value.title: Operating System
value.description: Provide the operating system software installed on the item that manages hardware, software resources, andProvides common services for computer programs.

value.title: Package Type
value.description: Provide the products package type

pattern.title: Pattern
pattern.description: Provide the most prominent repeated decorative design of the item

value.title: Pattern
value.description: Provide the most prominent repeated decorative design of the item

item_form.title: Item Form
item_form.description: Provide a value that represents the form of the item

value.title: Item Form
value.description: Provide a value that represents the form of the item

unit_count.title: Unit Count
unit_count.description: Specify the number of units and the unit type of the product

value.title: Unit Count
value.description: For products that are consumed by volume, weight, linear dimension, etc., provide the net quantity that would be shipped to a customer who orders one ASIN (e.g. 12 pack of 6 floz. bottles of water = 72, vs. a single 2 liter bottle = 2). For products consumed as individual units, provide the total number of units (pack of 12 pens = 12). For packed assortments of non-identical items, enter 1

type.title: Unit Count Type
type.description: For items consumed by volume, weight, linear dimension etc., provide the unit of measure listed on the products. For products consumed as individual units, enter: count

value.title: Unit Count Type
value.description: For items consumed by volume, weight, linear dimension etc., provide the unit of measure listed on the products. For products consumed as individual units, enter: count

product_site_launch_date.title: LaunchDate
product_site_launch_date.description: A date in this format: yyyy-mm-dd.

value.title: Product Site Launch Date
value.description: Provide the date the product launches and should first be shown on the Amazon website (YYYY-MM-DD format). PSLD does not impact buyability or pre-order logic, it is used to indicate when a product will be visible and searchable on the Amazon website

league_name.title: League Name
league_name.description: Name of league associated with this event

value.title: League Name
value.description: Provide the league name associated with this product

team_name.title: Team Name
team_name.description: Please enter the team name of this product

value.title: Team Name
value.description: Please enter the team name of this product

enum: Club Deportivo Social y Cultural - Cruz Azul
enumNames: Club Deportivo Social y Cultural - Cruz Azul

value.description: Provide a description of the scent of the item

hand_orientation.title: Hand Orientation
hand_orientation.description: Provide the hand orientation that the item is built for; left, right or both

value.description: Provide the hand orientation that the item is built for; left, right or both

band.title: Band

color.title: Band Color
color.description: Describe the color of the band.

value.description: Provide the dominant color of the band

material.description: Describe the material of the band.

value.description: Provide the material type of the band.

size.title: Band Size

value.description: Describe the size of the band.

matte_style.description: The type of matte on the product, typically furniture.
examples: Matte, Smooth Matte, Silk Matte, Textured Matte

parentage_level.title: Parentage Level
parentage_level.description: Specify whether a SKU is a parent or child

value.title: Parentage Level
value.description: Specify whether a SKU is a parent or child

child_parent_sku_relationship.title: Child Parent Sku Relationship
child_parent_sku_relationship.description: The attribute indicates the Child Parent Sku Relationship of the product

child_relationship_type.title: Child Relationship Type
child_relationship_type.description: The relationship that the child has to the parent

parent_sku.title: Parent SKU
parent_sku.description: The SKU of the parent item

variation_theme.title: Variation Theme
variation_theme.description: Specify the variation theme that the product will use. The theme's attributes must be populated for all items in the grouping.

name.title: Variation Theme Name
name.description: Specify the variation theme that the product will use. The theme's attributes must be populated for all items in the grouping.

safety_warning.title: Safety Warning
safety_warning.description: List safety information customers should know.
examples: Consult with a doctor before using this product.

value.title: Safety Warning
value.description: Provide any safety warnings printed on the item's packaging

country_of_origin.title: Country of Publication
country_of_origin.description: The country in which the product was published.

value.title: Country of Origin
value.description: Select the product's country of origin
enumNames: Heard Island and the McDonald Islands
Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
The Democratic Republic of the Congo

warranty_description.title: ManufacturerWarranty
warranty_description.description: A text string; 1500 characters maximum in length. Note: Type 1 High ASCII characters (®, ©, ™, etc.) or other special characters are not supported.

value.title: Warranty Description
value.description: Provide a description of the product's warranty

value.title: Are batteries required?
value.description: Select "yes" if batteries are required to power the item (or if the item is a battery) or "no" if they are not. Please note that an internal rechargeable battery is also considered a battery

value.title: Are batteries included?
value.description: Select "yes" if batteries are contained in the product (e.g. batteries inside a pair of Bluetooth headphones) and/or included with the product (e.g. batteries packed separately with a camera), otherwise select "no"

cell_composition.title: Battery Type
cell_composition.description: What type or composition is the battery?

value.title: Battery Cell Composition
value.description: Select the chemical composition of the battery cell

cell_composition_other_than_listed.title: Battery Cell Composition Other Than Listed
cell_composition_other_than_listed.description: Provide the components of the item's battery cell that are not already listed under battery cell composition.

value.title: Battery Cell Composition Other Than Listed
value.description: Provide the components of the item's battery cell that are not already listed under battery cell composition.

weight.title: Battery Weight
weight.description: Provide the total net weight of the batteries included. This is the weight of the standalone batteries not including packaging or the device it may be used in

value.title: Battery Weight
value.description: Provide the total net weight (numeric value) of the batteries included. This is the weight of the standalone batteries not including packaging or the device it may be used in.

unit.title: Battery Weight Unit
unit.description: Provide unit for battery weight

num_batteries.title: Number of Batteries
num_batteries.description: Provide the quantity and type of batteries needed to power the item.  If batteries are included with the item be sure to account for spare batteries provided

quantity.title: Number of Batteries
quantity.description: Specify the number of batteries needed to power the item.  If batteries are included with the item be sure to account for spare batteries provided

type.title: Battery Type
type.description: Provide battery type needed to power the item, including spares if included. Some options may be moved under other attribute eg. IEC code

value.title: Number of Lithium Metal Cells
value.description: Specify the total number of Lithium Metal cells in the product where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery (e.g. coin cells)

value.title: Number of Lithium-ion Cells
value.description: Specify the total number of Lithium-ion cells in the product where the cell isn't contained in an encased battery. For example, an AA battery is considered a cell

lithium_battery.title: Lithium Battery
lithium_battery.description: The attribute indicates the Lithium Battery of the product

value.title: Lithium Battery Energy Content
value.description: Provide the total energy stored in the lithium batteries used to power the item, measured in Watt Hours.

unit.title: Lithium Battery Energy Content Unit
unit.description: Select the corresponding unit

packaging.title: LithiumBatteryPackaging
packaging.description:
Select from one of the following:

batteries_only
batteries_contained_in_equipment
batteries_packed_with_equipment

value.title: Lithium Battery Packaging
value.description: Select “in equipment” if the battery is contained in the item . Select “with equipment” if the battery is packed separately with the device it is meant to power. Select “only” if the product is a battery sold alone or with items it is not meant to power.
examples: Batteries contained in equipment, Batteries packed with equipment, Batteries only

weight.title: Lithium Battery Weight
weight.description: Provide the weight of lithium contained in the cell or battery

value.title: Lithium Battery Weight
value.description: Provide the weight of lithium contained in the cell or battery as a numeric value

unit.title: Lithium Battery Weight Unit
unit.description: Select the corresponding weight unit

supplier_declared_dg_hz_regulation.title: Dangerous Goods Regulations
supplier_declared_dg_hz_regulation.description: If the product is a Dangerous Good or Hazardous Material, Substance or Waste that is regulated for transportation, storage, and/or waste select from the list of valid values

value.title: Dangerous Goods Regulations
value.description: If the product is a Dangerous Good or Hazardous Material, Substance or Waste that is regulated for transportation, storage, and/or waste select from the list of valid values

ghs.title: GHS
ghs.description: Provide the Global Harmonized System (GHS) information

classification.title: GHS Classification
classification.description: Provide the Global Harmonized System (GHS) CLP classification for the product

class.title: GHS Class
class.description: Select the GHS Class of the product from the list of valid values if GHS is selected as the Dangerous Goods Regulation. GHS Class indicates the warning statement assigned by the GHS classification system.
enumNames: Amazon Specific No Label With Warning

hazmat.title: Hazmat
hazmat.description: Provide hazmat information that is relevant to the product based on the aspect selected

aspect.title: Hazmat Aspect
aspect.description: Select the aspect or regulatory body used for the hazardous product information

value.title: Hazmat
value.description: Provide hazmat information that is relevant to the product based on the aspect selected

safety_data_sheet_url.title: Safety Data Sheet (SDS or MSDS) URL
safety_data_sheet_url.description: Provide the SDS/MSDS URL. Required for Hazardous material SDS/MSDS provides information such as physical data (flashpoint, pH, etc.), health concerns, storage, and transportation information for potentially dangerous substances.

value.title: Safety Data Sheet (SDS or MSDS) URL
value.description: Provide the SDS/MSDS URL if any value other than Not Applicable or Unknown is selected in the Dangerous Goods Regulation column.

item_weight.title: Item Weight
item_weight.description: A number with up to 10 digits to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point. Please do not use commas.

value.title: Item Weight
value.description: Provide the item weight numeric value (not including the packaging)

unit.title: Item Weight Unit
unit.description: Provide unit for item weight

regulatory_compliance_certification.title: Regulatory Compliance Certification
regulatory_compliance_certification.description: Provide any regulation that is relevant to the product as well as any required regulatory identications such as certification numbers.

regulation_type.title: Compliance Regulation Type
enumNames: Health Canada Pest Control Product Registration Number

value.title: Regulatory Identification
value.description: Provide the regulatory identification associated with the regulation type.

dsa_responsible_party_address.title: Responsible Person's Email or Electronic Address
dsa_responsible_party_address.description: Provide the email address identifier of the responsible party. This is the responsible party's contact information stored in RsP registry.

value.title: Responsible Person's Email or Electronic Address
value.description: Provide the email address identifier of the responsible party. This is the responsible party's contact information stored in RsP registry.

compliance_media.title: Compliance Media
compliance_media.description: Provide infornation on any compliance media including type and media location (e.g. a valid URL).

content_type.title: Compliance Media Content Type
content_type.description: Please enter the content type of the compliance document.

content_language.title: Compliance Media Language
content_language.description: Provide the language used for the content of the compliance media.

source_location.title: Compliance Media Source Location
source_location.description: Provide the source location of the compliance media.

gpsr_safety_attestation.title: GPSR Safety Attestation
gpsr_safety_attestation.description: Check “yes” if your product doesn’t have any warning and safety information, as it can be used safely and as intended without it.

value.title: GPSR Safety Attestation
value.description: Check “yes” if your product doesn’t have any warning and safety information, as it can be used safely and as intended without it.

gpsr_manufacturer_reference.title: GPSR Manufacturer Reference
gpsr_manufacturer_reference.description: Provide the reference email ID for the manufacturer address from your registry.

gpsr_manufacturer_email_address.title: GPSR Manufacturer Email Address
gpsr_manufacturer_email_address.description: Provide the reference email ID for the manufacturer address from your registry.

ships_globally.title: Ships Globally
ships_globally.description: Provide whether the item can be shipped globally by Amazon

value.title: Ships Globally
value.description: Provide whether the item can be shipped globally by Amazon

main_product_image_locator.title: Main Product Image Locator
main_product_image_locator.description: The attribute indicates the Main Product Image Locator of the product

media_location.title: Main Image URL
media_location.description: The URL where the main offer-specific image of the product is located.

other_product_image_locator_1.title: Other Product Image Locator 1
other_product_image_locator_1.description: The attribute indicates the Other Product Image Locator 1 of the product

media_location.title: Other Image URL
media_location.description: The URL for additional images of your product. These images will be shown on the detail page when the customer clicks through to see other views associated with the product.

media_location.title: Swatch Image URL
media_location.description: The URL where an image of a color swatch from the product is located

length.title: Item Length
length.description: Provide the length of the item

value.title: Item Length
value.description: Provide the item length as a numeric value.

unit.title: Item Length Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Item Length. If a value is provided for Item Length, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

width.title: Item Width
width.description: Provide the width of the item

value.title: Item Width
value.description: Provide the item width as a numeric value.

unit.title: Item Width Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Item Width. If a value is provided for Item Width, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

height.title: Item Height
height.description: Provide the height of the item

value.title: Item Height
value.description: Provide the item height as a numeric value.

unit.title: Item Height Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Item Height. If a value is provided for Item Height, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

value.title: Item Package Length
value.description: Provide the package length as a numeric value.

unit.title: Package Length Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Package Length. If a value is provided for Package Length, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

value.title: Item Package Width
value.description: Provide the package width as a numeric value.

unit.title: Package Width Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Package Width. If a value is provided for Package Width, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

value.title: Item Package Height
value.description: Provide the package height as a numeric value.

unit.title: Package Height Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Package Height. If a value is provided for Package Height, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

item_package_weight.title: PackageWeight
item_package_weight.description: A number with up to 10 digits to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point.

value.title: Package Weight
value.description: This attribute represents the weight of the item plus the packaging. If your item is shipped to the customer in multiple packages, enter the dimensions of the heaviest package

unit.title: Package Weight Unit
unit.description: Select the unit of measure for Package Weight. If a value is provided for Package Weight, you must also enter the corresponding unit.

item_display_weight.title: DisplayWeight
item_display_weight.description: A number with up to 10 digits to the left of the decimal point and 2 digits to the right of the decimal point. Please do not use commas.

value.title: Item Display Weight
value.description: Provide the item weight (numeric) if the product is a solid

unit.title: Item Display Weight Unit
unit.description: Select the corresponding unit

number_of_boxes.title: Number of Boxes
number_of_boxes.description: Provide the number of boxes that the product comes in

value.title: Number of Boxes
value.description: Provide the number of boxes that the product will be shipped in
